package.description:
Segmentation of 3d pointclouds in clutter vs. table surface Uses classifiers trained from 104 hand-labeled clutter table scans combing 3d LIDAR and camera color information.
The original training data is at: www.hrl.gatech.edu/data/clutter
Brunt of the work is done by: processor.py Main file is: run_segmentation_PR2.py
package.author: Jason Okerman, Martin Schuster, Advisors: Prof. Charlie Kemp and Jim Regh, Lab: Healthcare Robotics Lab at Georgia Tech
